main event: A white round object was observed in the sky over Cape Canaveral, Florida at an estimated altitude of 1,000 feet.
interesting points: The object was first observed at a distance of 2 to 300 yards and disappeared at 5-6 miles., The object was estimated to be 45-50 feet in diameter and to travel at approximately 1,200 mph., There was no sound or trail associated with the object during the sighting., The observation lasted between 3 to 5 seconds., The possibility of the object being a meteor was discounted based on its characteristics.
witness description: John V. Silvis, Captain, USAF, 555th Test Wing, Patrick AFB, Florida
